parameters.name: category
parameters.description:
The category of the inspection item. Valid values:

*   security: Security compliance
*   performance: Performance efficiency
*   stability: Business stability
*   limitation: Service limits
*   cost: Cost optimization

parameters.name: enableFilter
parameters.description: Inspection results filtering. If this parameter is set to true, only abnormal inspection items are returned.

parameters.name: level
parameters.description:
The level of the inspection item. Valid values:

*   advice: Suggestions
*   warning: Low severity
*   error: Medium severity
*   critical: High severity

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries per page. Maximum value: 50.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: The token that is used to display the returned tags on multiple pages.

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: The ID of the inspection report.

parameters.name: targetType
parameters.description: The type of the inspection object. Only items that meet the targetType parameter are returned.
